amendment.description: An amendment numbered 18 printed in Part B of House Report 116-366 to authorize the PFAS Infrastructure Grant Program for an additional three years.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 18 printed in Part B of House Report 116-366 to authorize the PFAS Infrastructure Grant Program for an additional three years.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Axne amendment (A017) as modified Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Axne amendment (A017) modified by unanimous consent.
